properties.name: identifier
properties.description: A unique identifier for this region.

properties.name: uuid
properties.description: The the beacon identifier the device will "watch" for. Many beacons can share the same uuid.

properties.name: major
properties.description: The beacon's major identifier number. Optional, of nothing is suppliedthe plugin will treat it as a wildcard.

properties.name: minor
properties.description: The beacon's minor identifier number. Optional, of nothing is suppliedthe plugin will treat it as a wildcard.

properties.name: notifyEntryStateOnDisplay
properties.description: If set to true the device will scan for beacons and determine region state anytimethe device's screen is turned on or off. Useful for debugging.
